entries.name: DEPRECATED
entries.desc: The deprecated options.

entries.name: Directory
entries.desc:
Option validator for OptionParser that matches a directory that exists on
the filesystem.

entries.name: Path
entries.desc:
Option validator for OptionParser that matches a file or directory that
exists on the filesystem.

entries.name: PathArray
entries.desc:
Option validator for OptionParser that matches a comma-separated list of
files or directories that exist on the filesystem.

entries.name: SPECIAL
entries.desc:
RDoc options ignored (or handled specially) by
–write-options

entries.name: Template
entries.desc:
Option validator for OptionParser that matches a template directory for an
installed generator that lives in
"rdoc/generator/template/#{template_name}"

entries.name: charset
entries.desc: Character-set for HTML output.  encoding is preferred over charset

entries.name: coverage_report
entries.desc: If true, only report on undocumented files

entries.name: dry_run
entries.desc: If true, RDoc will not write any files.

entries.name: encoding
entries.desc: The output encoding.  All input files will be transcoded to this encoding. The default encoding is UTF-8.  This is set via –encoding.

entries.name: exclude
entries.desc: Files matching this pattern will be excluded

entries.name: files
entries.desc: The list of files to be processed

entries.name: force_output
entries.desc: Create the output even if the output directory does not look like an rdoc output directory

entries.name: force_update
entries.desc: Scan newer sources than the flag file if true.

entries.name: formatter
entries.desc: Formatter to mark up text with

entries.name: generator
entries.desc: Description of the output generator (set with the --format option)

entries.name: generator_options
entries.desc: Loaded generator options.  Used to prevent –help from loading the same options multiple times.

entries.name: hyperlink_all
entries.desc: Old rdoc behavior: hyperlink all words that match a method name, even if not preceded by '#' or '::'

entries.name: line_numbers
entries.desc: Include line numbers in the source code

entries.name: locale
entries.desc: The output locale.

entries.name: locale_dir
entries.desc: The directory where locale data live.

entries.name: main_page
entries.desc: Name of the file, class or module to display in the initial index page (if not specified the first file we encounter is used)

entries.name: markup
entries.desc: The default markup format.  The default is 'rdoc'.  'markdown', 'tomdoc' and 'rd' are also built-in.

entries.name: op_dir
entries.desc: The name of the output directory

entries.name: option_parser
entries.desc: The OptionParser for this instance

entries.name: output_decoration
entries.desc: Output heading decorations?

entries.name: page_dir
entries.desc: Directory where guides, FAQ, and other pages not associated with a class live.  You may leave this unset if these are at the root of your project.

entries.name: pipe
entries.desc: Is RDoc in pipe mode?

entries.name: rdoc_include
entries.desc: Array of directories to search for files to satisfy an :include:

entries.name: root
entries.desc: Root of the source documentation will be generated for.  Set this when building documentation outside the source directory.  Defaults to the current directory.

entries.name: show_hash
entries.desc: Include the '#' at the front of hyperlinked instance method names

entries.name: static_path
entries.desc: Directory to copy static files from

entries.name: tab_width
entries.desc: The number of columns in a tab

entries.name: template
entries.desc: Template to be used when generating output

entries.name: template_dir
entries.desc: Directory the template lives in

entries.name: template_stylesheets
entries.desc: Additional template stylesheets

entries.name: title
entries.desc: Documentation title

entries.name: update_output_dir
entries.desc: Should RDoc update the timestamps in the output dir?

entries.name: verbosity
entries.desc: Verbosity, zero means quiet

entries.name: visibility
entries.desc: Minimum visibility of a documented method. One of :public, :protected, :private or :nodoc. The :nodoc visibility ignores all directives related to visibility.  The other visibilities may be overridden on a per-method basis with the :doc: directive.

entries.name: webcvs
entries.desc: URL of web cvs frontend

entries.name: check_files()
entries.desc: Check that the files on the command line exist

entries.name: check_generator()
entries.desc: Ensure only one generator is loaded

entries.name: default_title=(string)
entries.desc: Set the title, but only if not already set. Used to set the title from a source file, so that a title set from the command line will have the priority.

entries.name: exclude()
entries.desc: Create a regexp for exclude

entries.name: finish()
entries.desc: Completes any unfinished option setup business such as filtering for existent files, creating a regexp for exclude and setting a default template.

entries.name: finish_page_dir()
entries.desc: Fixes the #page_dir to be relative to the root_dir and adds the #page_dir to the files list.

entries.name: generator_descriptions()
entries.desc: Returns a properly-space list of generators and their descriptions.

entries.name: parse(argv)
entries.desc: Parses command line options.

entries.name: quiet()
entries.desc: Don't display progress as we process the files

entries.name: quiet=(bool)
entries.desc: Set quietness to bool

entries.name: sanitize_path(path)
entries.desc: Removes directories from path that are outside the current directory

entries.name: setup_generator(generator_name = @generator_name)
entries.desc: Set up an output generator for the named generator_name.

entries.name: template_dir_for(template)
entries.desc: Finds the template dir for template

entries.name: visibility=(visibility)
entries.desc: Sets the minimum visibility of a documented method.

entries.name: warn(message)
entries.desc: Displays a warning using Kernel#warn if we're being verbose

entries.name: write_options()
entries.desc: Writes the YAML file .rdoc_options to the current directory containing the parsed options.
